title: Choose a 'Pull Quote' for an Article Layout
description: A print designer needs a 'pull quote' (a short, compelling excerpt) from a feature story to use as a large, graphical element in the layout.

tasks.description: Read through the final draft of the article.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is familiar with the content.

tasks.description: Identify several short, powerful, and representative quotes from the article.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of potential pull quotes is generated.

tasks.description: Select the single best quote that captures the essence of the story and will entice people to read.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final pull quote is chosen.

tasks.description: Send the selected quote to the print designer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The designer receives the content they need for the layout.
